meanings.definition: A medical instrument used for examining body cavities
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a specula to check my ears.
meanings.sent2: The nurse handed the specula to the physician for the examination.
meanings.sent3: The specula looked like a tiny flashlight for exploring inside the body.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like specula, revealing every detail of the patient's condition.
meanings.sent5: The specula gleamed under the bright hospital lights, ready for use.

meanings.sent1: The specula in the telescope helped astronomers see distant stars clearly.
meanings.sent2: The specula were carefully aligned to enhance the telescope's performance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child pretended the specula in the telescope were magical portals.
meanings.sent4: The specula in the telescope reflected the vastness of the universe back to the observer.
meanings.sent5: Each specula in the telescope played a crucial role in capturing cosmic images.

meanings.definition: A plural form of the word 'speculum' referring to a reflective surface in a microscope
meanings.sent1: The specula in the microscope allowed for precise examination of tiny organisms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists adjusted the specula to focus the light on the specimen.
meanings.sent3: The curious student mistook the specula in the microscope for miniature mirrors.
meanings.sent4: The specula in the microscope revealed intricate details invisible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent5: The reflective specula in the microscope enhanced the clarity of the microscopic view.
